original_title: The Real Story of the Three Little Kittens
overview: Tom, Dick and Harriet, a mischievous trio from Whiskers End, get more than they bargain for the day they skip school to play in the snow. Unfortunately, the kittens lose their way and wander into the Fearful Forest, domain of Freezelda the Ice Queen.
title: The Real Story of the Three Little Kittens
